name: Rest
description: When you activate this move, you fall asleep after the end of your turn, but recover 4d6 + MOVE hit points in the process. You do not regain health if you do not fall asleep.
higherLevels: The dice roll for healing increases to 6d6 at level 5, 8d6 at level 10, and 8d10 at level 17.
